divs: sighting detailsthe first one i noticed because it was at tree line and very bright. it would stay still for a bit then move up and down real fast and then side to side like a zig zag motion. then noticed what looked like a airplane to the left of me. it was moving pretty fast and then stoped. when it stopped is when it started changing colors and hovering(rotating). also noticed one to the right of me that was flashing and hovering. by the time i looked back at the first one i saw it was gone. at that time i went inside and came back about 10 mins later. all 3 were gone from there original spots and there were two straight above and were side to side. at that time i was scared (******** word removed profanity) cms 10\13\11 09:06 cst flg and i went inside. now im on computer looking up pictures
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Marion
There were no other sightings in Marion on or around October 12th 2011
